name: jquery-sparkline
description: jQuery Sparklines plugin: fork jledoux/jquery.sparkline, npm supported, Bugfix issue#50 #63

scripts.build: concat -o dist/jquery.sparkline.js src/header.js src/defaults.js src/utils.js src/simpledraw.js src/rangemap.js src/interact.js src/base.js src/chart-line.js src/chart-bar.js src/chart-tristate.js src/chart-discrete.js src/chart-bullet.js src/chart-pie.js src/chart-box.js src/vcanvas-base.js src/vcanvas-canvas.js src/vcanvas-vml.js src/footer.js

author: evgeniy <grishko@100sp.ru>
